scripts.publish-forms: ng build  @myraeasy/forms && cd dist/myraeasy/forms && npm publish --registry http://10.34.11.2:4873/
scripts.publish-menu: ng build  @myraeasy/menu && cd dist/myraeasy/menu && npm publish --registry http://10.34.11.2:4873/
scripts.publish-accordions: ng build  @myraeasy/accordions && cd dist/myraeasy/accordions && npm publish --registry http://10.34.11.2:4873/
scripts.publish-multi-select: ng build  @myraeasy/multi-select && cd dist/myraeasy/multi-select && npm publish --registry http://10.34.11.2:4873/
scripts.publish-charts: ng build  @myraeasy/charts && cd dist/myraeasy/charts && npm publish --registry http://10.34.11.2:4873/
scripts.publish-relatorios: ng build  @myraeasy/relatorios && cd dist/myraeasy/relatorios && npm publish --registry http://10.34.11.2:4873/
scripts.build-all: ng build  @myraeasy/styles-myraeasy && ng build @myraeasy/forms && ng build @myraeasy/menu && ng build @myraeasy/charts  && ng build @myraeasy/relatorios && ng build @myraeasy/accordions
scripts.start: concurrently "ng build @myraeasy/styles-myraeasy --watch" "wait-on dist/myraeasy/styles-myraeasy/package.json -d 2000 " "ng build @myraeasy/forms --watch" "wait-on dist/myraeasy/forms/package.json -d 2000 " "ng build @myraeasy/menu --watch" "wait-on dist/myraeasy/menu/package.json -d 2000" "ng build @myraeasy/relatorios --watch" "wait-on dist/myraeasy/relatorios/package.json -d 2000" "ng build @myraeasy/accordions --watch" "wait-on dist/myraeasy/accordions/package.json -d 2000 && ng serve @myraeasy/demo" "ng build @myraeasy/charts --watch" "wait-on dist/myraeasy/charts/package.json -d 2000
